name: Lion Park Field
description: Well-maintained grass pitch in the heart of the park. Great for casual evening matches and pickup games.

name: Arena North
description: Premium indoor turf with LED lighting and shower rooms. Perfect for leagues and 5v5 paid sessions.

name: Sea Breeze Court
description: Open-air pitch by the sea. Slight wind in the evenings, magical sunsets. Casual and friendly crowd.

name: City Dome
description: Covered synthetic turf, regulation goals, excellent surface. Bookable by the hour for competitive play.

name: Neighborhood Green
description: Community pitch. Not perfect but always lively. Great for quick 6v6 games with locals.

name: Elite Sports Center
description: Top-tier facility with professional markings and staff. Ideal for tournaments and league nights.
